special_text:
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, Anne deals 2 damage to each opponent.
[+1]: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it until end of turn.
[+1]: Add {R}. If there are seven or more cards in your graveyard, add {R}{R} instead.
[-6]: Discard your hand, then draw two cards. Until end of turn, whenever you play a land or cast a spell, draw a card.
